name: QLThumbnailGenerator
desc: An object that generates thumbnail images based on provided requirements.

items.name: func generateBestRepresentation(for: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request, completion: (QLThumbnailRepresentation?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Generates the best possible thumbnail representation for a file and calls a handler upon completion.

items.name: func generateRepresentations(for: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request, update: ((QLThumbnailRepresentation?, QLThumbnailRepresentation.RepresentationType, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Generates various thumbnail representations for a file and calls the update handler for each thumbnail representation.

items.name: class QLThumbnailGenerator.Request
items.desc: A request to generate a thumbnail for a file.

items.name: func saveBestRepresentation(for: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request, to: URL, contentType: String, completion: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Saves the best representation of thumbnail for a specific request to the specified URL.

items.name: func cancel(QLThumbnailGenerator.Request)
items.desc: Cancels the generation of a thumbnail for a given request.
